text: Lewica literally meaning "the left" in Polish may refer to the following Polish left-wing parties: *Polish Socialist Party – Left *The Left (Poland) *Lewica Razem *Polish People's Party "Left" (Polskie Stronnictwo Ludowe "Lewica") *Polish Left (Polska Lewica) ==See also== *United Left (Poland) (Zjednoczona Lewica) *The Left (disambiguation)
title: Lewica
